meanings.definition: A person who commits bigamy by marrying more than one person at a time.
meanings.sent1: The bigamists were caught trying to marry two people on the same day.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, bigamists can face legal consequences for marrying multiple partners.
meanings.sent3: The bigamists accidentally invited both spouses to the same wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The town gossip spread rumors about the bigamists, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent5: The news of the bigamists' double weddings spread like wildfire through the small town.
